snippet.title: Truer Than You - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet the characters of Truer Than You in this announcement trailer for the upcoming visual novel game. Truer Than You will be available on Steam and Nintendo Switch in 2025.

Truer Than You is a choice-packed tale of love, loss, and finding purpose in life. Join Rin as they leave their past behind in favor of a new life, getting into unusual situations and meeting a cast of eccentric characters. Rin is pushed to step out of their comfort zone in increasingly bizarre scenarios as they get to grips with their new job at a secretive company specializing in renting out actors for real-life situations.
